name: developer-portal
description: This project aims to integrate the latest version of Wordpress with Mashery's API Management Service. It is composed of three parts:

scripts.start: if docker ps -a --filter="name=$npm_package_name" | grep $npm_package_name; then docker restart $npm_package_name; else npm run create; fi
scripts.purge: docker ps -a | grep "^[^CONTAINER]" | awk '{print $1}' | xargs docker rm
scripts.wp:install: docker exec -i $npm_package_name mysql -h localhost -u root -p$(docker exec $npm_package_name cat /mysql-root-pw.txt) wordpress < ./data.sql
scripts.wp:dump: docker exec $npm_package_name mysqldump --add-drop-database --add-drop-table -h localhost -u root -p$(docker exec $npm_package_name cat /mysql-root-pw.txt) wordpress > ./data.sql
